div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.p: Our Social Work team is working hard to get our community the most up to date resources. Please seeÂ CLICK RESOURCES to learn more about:
We will continue to update this document as we obtain more information, so please check the link regularly.

ul.li: Unemployment relief: New York State has waived the seven day waiting period for workers to claim unemployment insurance:Â https://www.governor.ny.gov/news/after-weeks-demanding-approval-governor-cuomo-announces-fda-gives-new-york-state-authority
File forÂ New York State Unemployment :Â https://www.ny.gov/services/unemployment-0

p.em: Bagged breakfasts and lunches are no longer available to picked up at Heketi. The closest site distributing grab and go meals isÂ P.S. 5 on E. 149th St and Jackson Ave

ul.li: Find other NYC DOE sites distributing food here:Â https://www.schools.nyc.gov/freemeals
Chefs providing food in the Bronx:Â https://wck.org/news/thebronx

Charter is offering free broadband and WIFI for a limited time to students to help learn during the outbreak:Â https://corporate.charter.com/newsroom/charter-to-offer-free-access-to-spectrum-broadband-and-wifi-for-60-days-for-new-K12-and-college-student-households-and-more
Verizon FIOS is tripling data tier allowances:Â https://www.verizon.com/about/news/verizons-covid-19-relief-efforts
Comcast is offering free WIFI hotspots:Â https://corporate.comcast.com/covid-19
